content: maddy lou crochet a lli b c e a e n h i t e pattern 6 very back loop half double_crochet series maddy lou crochet the calli beanie pattern introduction this is the sixth pattern in a series of patterns which utilizes the extra loop of half double crochet stitches which is one of my favorite crochet techniques that creates a knit-look this pattern is perfect for the fall and winter weather it s a simple made-to-measure pattern that complements the calli cowl so i m also naming this one after my partner who is the most thoughtful person i know and makes my life better every day i love you calli what you ll need tools 9 00 mm crochet hook or size appropriate for chosen yarn scissors measuring tape yarn roughly120 yards of weight 6 super bulky yarn i used two skeins of colorway astroland in lion s brand wool ease thick and quick my holy grain yarn i have also made adult-sized beanies in this pattern using just one skein 250 yards of lion brand s heartland weight 4 yarn construction notes the calli beanie is a made to measure pattern you can use any weight yarn and make any size beanie so yardage will vary the pattern is worked top to bottom in row rather than in rounds so your starting chain is going to be the height of your beanie - not the fit around your head a longer starting chain will make a slouchier beanie and a shorter starting chain will make a more fitted beanie keep in mind that your starting length needs to account for the fold-over brim of the beanie finally note that this beanie is essentially worked into a long rectangle which is then seamed into a tubed and cinched at the top copyright information copyright @ madison hansen 2023 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means without prior written permission from the author sales of finished products are permitted but the designer requests that you link back to the pattern and credit maddy lou crochet with the original design if you have any questions or comments please reach out to madisonlouisehansen@gmail com page 1 maddy lou crochet the calli beanie stitch glossary and special stitches stitches used us terminology chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hdcvflo half_double_crochet very front loop only slip_stitch slip_stitch special stitches the hdcvflo is worked exactly like a normal half_double_crochet - the only difference is where the stitch is placed the yarn over in a half_double_crochet creates a third loop below the traditional front and back loops when you re working in row for the calli beanie this loop will be on the very front of the stitch work your hdcvflo stitches in this very front third loop only i recommend placing your hook through this loop from bottom to top see the visual representation below this technique can take a little bit of getting used to
